PrivacyPolicy:
Graph Marketing takes data protection seriously.
We keep to a minimum the information we hold about you.
We use your data to provide our services to you, respond to your enquiries, and meet our legal obligations.
We delete your data when it is no longer needed for these things.
Generally, we do not give your information to third parties, but there are some exceptions.
You have privacy rights as an individual and we are happy to talk to you about how we process and protect your data.

- Where our apps require use of your information to work, we will store and use information you provide locally on the device or on our servers and not share that information with anyone else unless specific consent is given.
- Our free applications use advertising currently provided by Admob. You will be asked to provide consent to receive adverts provided by Admob before being served any adverts. Anonymous statistical information is reported to them so they can see whether their adverts are effective. More information about Admob can be found at: www.admob.com.
- We will only disclose your personal information if we have a legal obligation to do so, or if we need to enforce an obligation against you, or if you are using an application which is designed to share that data.
- Privacy Policies relating to apps are available within the apps.
- Any changes we may make to our privacy policy in the future will be posted on this page and served to any affected apps you have installed.

If you have any questions about this policy or Graph Marketing Ltd, please contact us at enquiries@graph.marketing
